response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, this product is truly an investment worth considering. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an excellent opportunity for you to acquire such a valuable asset at a fraction of its true worth. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, contributing positively to your business goals. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
